query: SELECT id, userId, title, content, memoryType FROM learning_diaries WHERE userId = 1 AND (title LIKE '%張%' OR content LIKE '%張%' OR title LIKE '%醫療%' OR content LIKE '%醫療%' OR title LIKE '%保險%' OR content LIKE '%保險%');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user VqBKoEwKfw4feq4.6cd8cd1ff95f --database aavW9BLbZ6sZHaPEemayyD --execute SELECT id, userId, title, content, memoryType FROM learning_diaries WHERE userId = 1 AND (title LIKE '%張%' OR content LIKE '%張%' OR title LIKE '%醫療%' OR content LIKE '%醫療%' OR title LIKE '%保險%' OR content LIKE '%保險%');

rows.title: 客戶張先生的保險需求
rows.content: 客戶張先生對醫療保險很感興趣，他有兩個小孩，關心教育基金。他希望為家人提供全面的保障，特別是醫療和教育方面。
